name: Mediafly
overview:
Mediafly is the trusted provider of innovative mixed media distribution solutions for the Fortune 1000. Mediafly helps clients bridge the gap between their compelling content and the diverging range of mobile and smart devices.

Business has rapidly moved into an era of connectivity in which employees and CEOs collectively demand information accessibility via smart devices. What started at the fringe of the workforce has now fused into its core. Companies now face a unique set of challenges as the number of devices continues to grow and the formats become more complex.

The fragmentation caused by shifts in technology stretches existing IT staff thin, especially in “Bring Your Own Device” (BYOD) environments. Concurrently, the convenience of being able to retrieve mixed media on the go can pose a threat to company security. Issues also arise over the control of internal and external user access.

Mediafly eliminates this complexity by providing an innovative cloud-based solution that satisfies today’s business needs to manage and securely distribute a variety of content across the wide array of connected devices. Mediafly’s award-winning, client-branded applications keep content under company control, while tracking user behavior metrics to help optimize strategies.

Mediafly offers a complete Software as a Service (SaaS) solution for success: Trust: Security vetted by industry-leading Fortune 100 firms Efficiency: Deploys in a fraction of traditional development time and delivers the right content to the right devices from a single platform Flexibility: Scalable and adapts with the latest shifts in technology and integrates with your existing IT infrastructure and authentication systems

Mediafly Product Line: SalesKit: Productivity tools for mobile sales enablement & product marketing ProReview: Movie/TV & Advertising Industry review of dailies, rough cuts, pilots; awards screening Enterprise: Education, training, & communications (including live broadcasts) across multiple screens

Mediafly: ✔ Complete ✔ Integrated ✔ Future-Proof
